kinky adjective
(CURLY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
Kinky hair forms tight curls (= curving shapes) in a zigzag (= like a Z or a row of Zs joined together) or S-shaped pattern from the scalp (= the part of the head where the hair grows): My hair is naturally kinky. She was one of the first models with short, kinky hair to feature in western fashion magazines. Compare
curly
coily
wavy
frizzy
More examplesFewer examplesWomen with kinky, frizzy hair shared their stories with her.While we often associate dark skin with kinky hair, dark-skinned people around the globe can have frizzy, curly, wavy, and straight hair.
